name: Butterfly Detection (INIT Build Team)
description: Designed and assembled hardware setup for Raspberry Pi 4 integration with Python libraries such as OpenCV.
Configured connections between Raspberry Pi 4 and cloud storage via Google Drive API for secure online data transfer.
Assisted with website building with React to showcase the Build Team project.

name: Driver Drowsiness Detection System App
description: Developed a mobile application using React Expo to monitor driver alertness through facial recognition.
Built front-end and back-end components for ML model integration to allow users to track drowsiness patterns via statistics.
Designed a login system for user authentication and data access via a mobile app through the NoSQL database service, Firebase.

name: GeekText (Bookstore  REST API)
description: Constructed a python based REST API service to support and manage an online bookstore.
Designed a codebase around applications architectural patterns and built a relational database structure in MySQL to support user, book, and shopping management.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences.
